name: Hungry Dragon Attack
description:
In a world, one dragon, needed to eat in order to fly. And that dragon, is, me. 

I am Krogar, the green dragon, and I am on a mission to eat and fly. But it's not as easy as it sounds. 

I have to be careful where I get my food. Cattle and sheep are always a good choice, but I have to avoid the villagers or they'll try to kill me. 

And I have to be careful not to eat too much. If I get too fat and round, it will be too easy for my enemies to take me down. But if I don't eat enough, I won't have the energy to survive. 

The key to success is finding the right balance. And I have a big goal to achieve - I need to find 10 treasure chests to satisfy my hunger. Don't let me down.
